post0.title: Curated List To Help Kids Learning
post0.content: Hello All, . My name is Kin Shah and I have created this curated list of useful sites (mostly free) that I found useful from twitter. This is my humble effort to help all parents and their kids in this most needed times. Also, this list will help parents focus on their kids learning and keep them engage/focused : . Note: Some are completely free and some are free for the rest of school year. Thanks to all the sites that have put in effort to help kids learn during this COVID-19 Pandemic ! This is a work in progress. Feel free to make a Pull Request (PR) and I will merge the changes where appropriate. . SCHOLASTIC LEARN AT HOME | LEARNING A-Z | PBS LEARNING MEDIA | BRAINPOP | NÀT GEO 4 KIDS | VOOKS | ABCYA | HIGHLIGHTS KIDS | BOOM LEARNING | STORYLINE ONLINE | TIME FOR KIDS | ABC MOUSE | GONOODLE | WONDEROPOLIS | Youtube Learning At Home | AudibleFromAmazon | Khan academy Kids – Completely Free ! Detailed Schedule | . | iRobot Offline activity | Happy Numbers | Transum Mathematics | 175+ Amazing Online Learning Resources | 60+ Awesome Websites for Teaching and Learning Math | Duolingo - learn a language | Scratch - by MIT | Newsela | . Thank you ! . ~ Kin Shah .

page1.title: About Me
page1.content: This is where you put the contents of your About page. Like all your pages, it’s in Markdown format. . This website is powered by fastpages 1. . a blogging platform that natively supports Jupyter notebooks in addition to other formats. ↩ . |
